Detailed Description

cvmx_mdab::_rd_limit

The maximum number of 128-bit sized chunks that the RD-DMA engine may write starting from the 128-bit-aligned MDAB_RD_ADDR. During Job_Type = LD_LCL* commands, hardware loads the RD_ADDR/RD_LIMIT registers directly from the Job Descriptor's DMA section(s).
